build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Ishtar's Ring - Reinforce, Guardbreak and Boss Rush
  • Spikes Royale - Guardbreak and Temper Link
    • Can be changed if you don't train with
  • Use Water Shield - Reinforce if you have trouble with survivability while training between Lv. 160 - 200

nodeInfo.recommended:
For Bossing
For Training
For Both
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category to separate your bossing and training nodes
  • Training Trio can be equipped for training and unequipped during bossing
  • 6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Ignis Roar
extraContent.content:
A majority of Mercedes' attacks can be linked together which reduces the delay between skills. In 2nd Job, you gain an attack Rising Rush that is used to combo with another skill for a follow up attack

Below is all the skills that combo with Rising Rush:

  • Parting Shot (2nd Job)
  • Aerial Barrage (3rd Job)
  • Rolling Moonsault (4th Job) - Can be used without Rising Rush

In 3rd Job, you gain a passive Ignis Roar where whenever you link/combo an attack, you gain a stacking %Final Damage buff

primary.name: Elven Healing
primary.shortDesc: Recovers HP and MP by 5% of Max HP and MP every 4 seconds.

primary.name: Updraft
primary.shortDesc: Can be used on ladders or ropes.\n[Command:Up Arrow Key + Jump ]
primary.desc: When climbing ladders, pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump key will launch you up

primary.name: Elven Grace
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Attack Speed 1 level. Speed: +10, Jump: +20, Damage Against Normal Monsters: 10%, Charm: +30

primary.name: Elven Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Elluel\nCooldown: 600 sec\nAdditional Effect: Permanently receive 20% additional EXP
details: Mercedes has a shorter cooldown for active part of the skill compared to the linked version
Can be found in the Link Manager

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'The Unfinished Battle'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Swift Dual Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Arrows Fired: 3, Damage: 125%, Max Monsters Hit: 3
primary.desc: Fire multiple arrows forward that hit several enemies

primary.name: Potential Power
primary.shortDesc: Movement Speed: +30, Max Movement Speed Limit: +165, Damage: +20%, Enemy Attack Avoidance Rate: 20%

primary.name: Spirit Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Sharp Aim
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Piercing Storm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 120%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Penetration Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a flurry of arrows forward that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Rising Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 250%, Launch Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 2 times, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage when Attacking Airborne Enemies: +30%p
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing enemies and launching them into the air
details: If you hold the down arrow key while pressing Rising Rush, it will instead launch enemies up without dashing forward
Deals increased %p Damage to enemies in the air

During the launch attack, you can combine the skill with other skills for a combo attack such as:
  • Parting Shot (2nd job)
  • Aerial Barrage (3rd job)
  • Rolling Moonsault (4th job)

primary.name: Parting Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Fires arrows at enemies launched by
details: Pressing the Attack key during the launch attack will also activate the attack

primary.name: Agile Bowguns
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Spirit Surge
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +30%, Critical Rate: +15%

primary.name: Dual Bowguns Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Dual Bowguns Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Final Attack: Dual Bowguns
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 40%, Final Attack Damage: 75%, Number of Hits: 2
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Stunning Strikes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 260%, Number of Arrows: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 5, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 6 sec, Final Damage to Stunned Enemies: +20%
primary.desc: Fires piercing arrows forward, dealing increased %Final Damage to stunned targets
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Deals increased %Final Damage to stunned enemies

This attack can be used in the air and linked when used first with:
  • Rising Rush (2nd job)
  • Unicorn Spike (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Lightning Edge (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

primary.name: Leap Tornado
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Rain arrows down up enemies below you
details: Can only be used while in the air

Can be held as soon as you jump or put in a macro to use skill twice per jump
  • Results are more consistent with more Attack Speed
Can be used along with to increase jump distance

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Gust Dive (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

primary.name: Unicorn Spike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 62, Damage: 345%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Critical Attacks: 6, Additional Damage Debuff Chance: 100%, Additional Damage Debuff Duration: 30 sec, Additional Damage: 30%\nCooldown: 9 sec\nUsing link skills reduces cooldown by 1 sec
primary.desc: Sends out a rampage of unicorns that dash forward and debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage
Can be used while in the air
Using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

primary.name: Gust Dive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: While in the air, dash diagonally towards the ground
details:
This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Stunning Strikes (3rd job)
  • Leap Tornado (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Lightning Edge (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

Using a non-macroed during the animation of Gust Dive removes the end delay allowing you to move immediately afterwards
  • Allows Gust Dive to be spammed
  • If you cannot get it to work, try spamming both and together until you get the hang of it

primary.name: Water Shield
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5%, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec.\nCooldown: 70 sec\n[Passive Effects]: Damage Taken: -30%, Status Resistance: +25, Elemental Resistance: +25%, Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: Upon use, grants brief invincibility
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reduction, Status Resistance, and %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Aerial Barrage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 105%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Passive Effects - Rising Rush Damage: +100%p]
primary.desc: Strikes enemies when linked with
details: [Passive]Permanently increases the %p damage of
Another way to activate is to press the Up Arrow Key and Attack key during launch attack
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Leap Tornado (3rd job)
  • Gust Dive (3rd job)
  • Rolling Moonsault (4th job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

Skill is considered a teleport, meaning that it can be used to dodge boss attacks
  • For example, Lotus lasers, Magnus meteors & spin)
  • Usually executed by using it after Down Arrow Key +

primary.name: Elemental Knights
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Summons 1 random Spirit for 210 sec, can summon up to 2 Spirits.
Ice Spirit - Damage: 435%, Freeze Chance: 90%, Freeze Duration: 5 sec
Fire Spirit - Damage: 435%, Damage over time: 110% damage every 1 sec for 5 sec
Shadow Spirit - Damage: 548%
Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, summon an Elemental Knight to fight by your side
details:
There are 3 possible spirits that can be summoned
  • [Ice Spirit]: Has a chance to freeze enemies
  • [Fire Spirit]: Attacks apply a burn effect to enemies
  • [Shadow Spirit]: Attacks deal increased damage
When triggered, a cooldown will occur before another spirit can be summoned
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ignis Roar
primary.shortDesc: Final damage increased by 2% and Attack Speed by 1 when using linked skills. Final damage increase due to linked skill usage can stack up to 10 times, lasts for 30 sec, damage is stacked additively.\n[Passive Effects - Avoidability +20%, Final Damage +25%, ATT: +40]
primary.desc: When successfully linking skills together, gain an Attack Speed (+1 stage) and a stacking %Final Damage (additive) buff
details: Also permanently increases %Avoidability, %Final Damage and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Ishtar's Ring
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 10, Damage: 316%, Number of Attacks: 2\nWhen hit, Ignis Roar Duration: +0.1 sec\n[Passive Effect: Unicorn Spikes Damage: +100%p]
primary.desc: When held, rapidly fires in front of you hitting only one enemy
details: You can move while casting
Successful hits briefly increases the duration of
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %p Damage of

primary.name: Spikes Royale
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60. Delivers a Critical attack. Damage: 630%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 4
Enemy DEF: -30%, Duration: 60 sec
Cooldown: 5 sec
Cooldown reduced by 1 second each time a linked skill is used.
[Passive Effect - Leap Tornado Damage: +206% points, doesn't apply to HEXA Leaf Tornado]
primary.desc: Leap up into the air and rain down spears on enemies while debuffing them
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %DEF
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %p Damage of
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

primary.name: Lightning Edge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 74, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 3, and dash forward\n[Passive Effect: Gust Dive Damage: +237%p]
primary.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies in your path
details: [Passive]: Increases the %p Damage of

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Rising Rush (2nd job)
  • Stunning Strikes (3rd job)
  • Unicorn Spike (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

Using a non-macroed during the animation of Lightning Edge removes the end delay allowing you to move immediately afterwards
  • Allows Lightning Edge to be spammed
  • If you cannot get it to work, try spamming both and together until you get the hang of it

primary.name: Rolling Moonsault
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 6
Spirit Jump is reset after use. However, using Rolling Moonsault after an upward jump does not reset Spirit Jump.
Cooldown: 4 sec
[Passive Effects - Rising Rush, Aerial Barrage Damage: +195%p]
primary.desc: While in the air, spin and damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %p Damage of and
Can be used without
Another way to activate is to press the Down Arrow Key and Attack key during the launch attack
After casting, can be used again unless the vertical jump was used
Casting after using grants additional airborne height compared to using it on its own

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Leap Tornado (3rd job)
  • Gust Dive (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Wrath of Enlil (Hyper Skill)

primary.name: Spirit Nimble Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, cancels your current skill and move in the desired direction by using any arrow key while Mercedes is performing a skill mid-air.\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: While attacking in the air, dash in a given direction while cancelling the attack and animation of the previous skill
details: To activate, click on any Arrow Key and the Skill Key together while attacking

Can be used mid-dash during and
  • Keeps momentum of original skill, allowing for some unique movement

primary.name: Ancient Warding
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, For 200 seconds, Attack Power +30%, HP: +1500\n[Passive Effect: Ignis Roar's Avoidability Chance: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +60%]

primary.name: Staggering Strikes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 456%, Number of Arrows: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 6 sec, Final Damage to Stunned Enemies: +20%
details: Increases %Damage and max enemies hit
Color of arrows are changed to red from green

primary.name: Dual Bowguns Expert
primary.shortDesc: Dual Bowguns Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Defense Break
primary.shortDesc: Ignored Enemy DEF: 25%, Final Damage +20%, When Attacking Boss Monsters - Damage: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 75%, Damage: 120%, Times Activated: 2.
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

hyperPassive.name: Ishtar's Ring - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When attacking Boss Monsters with Ishtar's Ring - Damage: +20%

hyperPassive.name: Spikes Royale - Temper Link
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the passive %Damage increase to and

hyperActive.name: Elvish Blessing
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 120 sec, Attack Power: +80\n[Passive Effect: Final Damage: +10%]

hyperActive.name: Wrath of Enlil
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 515%, Number of Attacks: 10.
Attack a boss grants a debuff that ignores collision with that boss for 60 sec
Cooldown: 8 sec,
Cooldown reduced by 1 sec when a Link skill is used.
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a furious attack in front of you
details: Bosses damaged by this attack receive a debuff that prevents touch damage

This attack can be linked when used first with:
  • Rising Rush (2nd job)
  • Stunning Strikes (3rd job)
  • Unicorn Spike (3rd job)
  • Spikes Royale (4th job)
  • Lightning Edge (4th job)
Using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Elluel
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 90 sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use up to 3 time each
Afterimage Final Damage: 60%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: 90% (-20% per successful mimic)
Ishtar's Ring Activation Chance: 50%
Elluel's Form - Deal 900% damage 8 times on up to 10 enemies for 10 sec, cooldown decreases by 1 sec after using a linked skill
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, attacks have a chance to create afterimages that mimic your skills
details:
While active, periodically a giant tree appears that deals damage to enemies
  • The giant tree has a cooldown (10 secs) but using link skills (combos) will reduce the cooldown by 1 sec

fifthMain.name: Sylvidia's Flight
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Mount Duration: 23 sec. Attack Power: +20%, Damage Taken: -25% (Includes HP% Based Attacks)\nDash attack deals 1430% damage to up to 12 enemies 9 times.\nCooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Mount onto Sylvidia and dash through enemies
details: Pressing first will mount onto Sylvidia and during the duration of the mount, you can press again to perform a dash attack and pressing the Down Arrow Key and Attack Key will allow you to cancel the skill and unmount

Sylvidia's attacks can also be triggered by pressing the Jump Key in midair
  • If you hold the Up arrow key while pressing , you will dash upwards diagonally
You receive max stacks of while riding
During the duration of the skill, you gain %Attack, %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks), and 100% Knockback Resistance
While riding, only certain skills can be used: , , , , , , , , , and

fifthMain.name: Irkalla's Wrath
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, can press the key down for up to 6 sec, attacks up to 10 enemies in front of you to deal 880% damage 12 times consecutively.
When the attack hits, Ignis Roar Duration: +0.3 sec.
You can use it while walking backward and can change direction by pressing the direction key twice
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of arrows towards the direction you are facing
details: Successful hits briefly increases the duration of

While the skill is active, you can move but only walk backwards and cannot jump
  • To change directions, press the Arrow Key of the direction you want to face twice

fifthMain.name: Royal Knights
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting and disarmament\nDuration: 30 sec, up to 4 knights appear when attack by Mercedes hits, each dealing 800% damage 4 times, Cooldown: 1.4 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, whenever you attack, knights will appear and damage nearby enemies
details: You are invincible during the initial cast and ending of the skill
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the buff early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ishtar's Ring
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost per attack: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 525%, Number of Attacks: 2
When attack hits, Ignis Roar Duration: +0.1 sec
When attack hits, enemy is branded with Ishtar's Mark for 90 sec.
Ishtar's Mark: Increases when direct skill attack hits 6 times, increases HEXA Ishtar's Ring and Irkalla's Wrath hits 12 times
Every time mark is filled up, Damage: 610%, Number of Additional Attacks: 3
When mark is complete, Damage: 740%, Number of Additional Attacks: 8
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Wrath of Enlil
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 230, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 10
Attacking a boss grants a debuff that ignores collision with that boss for 60 sec
Cooldown: 8 sec
Cooldown reduced by 1 sec when a Link skill is used.
Enhances to HEXA Wrath of Enlil: Spirit Enchant every 12 sec
[Passive Effect: Ishtar's Mark Creation Damage: +240%p, Ishtar's Mark Completion Damage: +290%p]
------Spirit Enchant------
MP Cost: 230, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 935%, Number of Attacks: 10\Attacking a boss grants a debuff that ignores collision with that boss for 60 sec, Debuff doesn't stack with Wrath of Enlil.
Cooldown: 12 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Spikes Royale
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70. Delivers a Critical attack. Damage: 1055%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 4
Enemy DEF: -35%, Duration: 60 sec
Cooldown: 5 sec
Cooldown reduced by 1 second each time a Linked Skill is used.
Enhances to HEXA Spikes Royale: Spirit Enchant every 12 sec.
------Spirit Enchant------
MP Cost: 70. Delivers a Critical attack. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1160%, Number of Attacks: 4
Enemy DEF: -35%, Duration: 60 sec, Debuff doesn't stack with Spikes Royale.
Cooldown: 12 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Leaf Tornado
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 51, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 780%, Number of Attacks: 4
Enhances to HEXA Leaf Tornado: Spirit Enchant every 6 sec.
------Spirit Enchant------
MP Cost: 51, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 4
Cooldown: 6 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Unfading Glory
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Shockwave Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 840%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Crashes: 36
The spirit power makes the Spirit King form and summons for 60 sec, Summon Cooldown: 3 sec
Spirit King Form - Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2200%, Number of Attacks: 15
When Ishtar's Mark is complete, the power of Ishtar is added making the next attack an enhanced attack.
Enhanced Attack - Damage: 1440%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Shockwaves: 4, Cooldown: 2 sec
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Mercedes is a DEX archer class part of the Heroes. Mercedes is known for their quick mobility and ability to link attacks together
